meya “manawa himikam pilibanda wimarshanayak misa aparadha parikshanayak nowana bawa” mema warthawa mangin pahadili wana bawath, “widhana damaya pilibanda wistharaye dakwa athi nam mangin mehi layisthugatha kara athi ullanghanayan sambandhayen sruju wagakimak lesa ho ana yatathe ho ihala mattame wagakimak lesa saparadhi wagakimak adahas nokarana bawath, pudgala saparadhi wagakima thiranaya kala hakke awashya siyalu nisi kriyadamayan sahathika kara athi adhikaranayak mangin pamanak bawath” sihipath karana ladi.

habayi kramaya pahadiliwa kiwa yuthu ya.
ee nisa owun rupalawanya nishpadana walata owunge mudal kalaya boho
lassanata inna oone"

shira lankawe wesena sinhala, drawida, muslim yana jathin sankhyathmakawa maha jathiya ha sulu jathin washayen khediya haki wuwath sapalath kururu yuddhaya hethuwen gewannata siduwu wandiye wishalathwayen ha gambaurin eka ha samana wiya.
“amma dan gedara dara palanne kawuda?”
indhana hingayak indhana nawak aapasu harawa yawa athi bawath kiyayi.
‘ane prasanna chithrapataya thahanam unada.....
nawanetham pille mahathmiya demala jathiwadi kanthawak bawata apa thula thakseruwak thibe.
lankawe krikat kshethrayatada suwisal sewayak kala watmor mahatha upatha labanne 1954 marthu 16da kolambaadiyi.
niwarthana kalapaye ratak wana meya sancharaka karmanthaya athin loka prasiddhayi.
sama wayase aya samaga keli sellam karamin kalaya gewiya.
eyala kiyana widihata nam meka gedara nikan idan salli hoyanna puluwan wadak widihita.

thama diyaniyage adhyapanaya wadagath kota salaku mawa shekshpiyarge pothakata nikal ekak (dolarayakin wissen ekak), dikansge pothakata dim ekak (dolarayakin dahayen ekak) saha nitshe, kant ho dawinge pothakata dim eka hamarak aadi washayen magaratge kiyawimwalata gewim kalaya.

ayahapath kalagunayath samanga nayayam awadanam kalapa lesa nam kala disthrikka wana kaluthara , rathnapura , galla , nuwaraeliya ha badulle atham pradeshawalajanathawa wetha jathika godanangili paryeshana aayathanaya magin labadi thibu awawadaya thawa dinakin digukara athayi aapada kalamanakarana madhyasthanaya pawasayi. wasi thaththwaya aduwimak pennum kalada atham pradeshawala pahath bimwala thawamath jalaya basa yama itha semin siduwimak pawathina nisa awathanwuwan kadawuru 128ka pawul 5673ka pudgalayan 28809k sitina bawath mbaawunta awashya aahara pana athulu awashya sahana sapayima rajaya magin akhandawa sidu keremin pawathina bawath aapada kalamanakarana madhyasthanaye madhya adhyakshaka sarath lal mahatha dinaminata pawasiya.me wana wita pawul 26 343ka pudgalayan ek laksha hathdahas thunsiya hathalis ekak awathanwa athayida athurudanwuwan 1kda marana 23kda thuwala karuwan 11kda sitina bawath purnahaniwu niwasa 169kda ardha haniwu niwasa 1242kda pawathina bawath aapada kalamanakarana madhyasthanaya anawaranaya kara siti..
